description: Short distance from city center. 2 km hike with 300' elevation change. View of Okanagan Lake at the start.  2 waterfalls; first is around 20' and the second around 40'.  Initial slope very steep.  Chose to scale the canyon at second falls and follow Lower South Slopes Trails back to start at Canyon Falls Crt.
directions: Park at the end of Canyon Falls Crt. in Crawford Estates, Kelowna. Trailhead starts immediately off street with steep switchback to canyon floor.
title: Crawford Falls, Kelowna
